questions.question: Q1. In an electrochemical cell, which of the following current is present even in the absence of the analyte?
Q2. In differential pulse voltammetry, the graph is obtained by plotting ____________.

answers.a: The potential difference as a function of current.
answers.b: The current difference as a function of potential.
answers.c: The potential difference as a function of time.
answers.d: The current difference as a function of time.
